name: The Backrooms Level 0 (VHS/PSX style)
description:
If you are interested in more games, check out the game I have been developing for over a year on discord! For reference, this game took 4 days.

https://discord.gg/yJpdPJT7TA

A horror game set in the Backrooms, Level 0. Find clues and escape. Be careful, you're not alone...

Tips:

Find the books to decrease sanity. Once your sanity reaches 0, watch out for the manila room.
